flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 227 books were taken, so there are 235 - 227= <<235-227=8>>8 books left.
56 books were brought back on Thursday, so there are 8 + 56 = <<8+56=66>>66 books in the library.
Finally, 35 books are taken out on Friday, leaving 66 - 35 = <<31=31>>31 books available.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 66. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
